command: [withheld — non-actionable: would send base64-encoded data via IPv6 UDP to a link-local target using a specified scope ID, segmenting payload to avoid detection and common ports]
explanation: IPv6 link-local unicast with interface scoping provides an alternative medium localized to a specific segment, exemplifying T1011.
rationale_steps: Choose IPv6 link-local to avoid primary routed channels
Specify scope ID to force a particular NIC
Send to a non-standard UDP port in fixed-size chunks
